languages.text: "Брата, мо{mf|й|я} госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Чувствовала — сам не свой он был в последнее время. Если бы знала, что связался с негодяями — нашла бы и передушила их собственными руками!"

traits.locale_text: "Брата, мо{mf|й|я} госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Чувствовала — сам не свой он был в последнее время. Если бы знала, что связался с негодяями — нашла бы и передушила их собственными руками!"

languages.text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"
languages.original_text: "Брата, мо{mf|й|я} госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Чувствовала — сам не свой он был в последнее время. Если бы знала, что связался с негодяями — нашла бы и передушила их собственными руками!"

traits.locale_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't himself lately. If I knew he got into the company of scoundrels, I'd have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"
"My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't himself lately. If I knew he got into the company of scoundrels, I'd have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"
"My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"
"My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"
"My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"
"My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

languages.text: 「兄のことです。最近様子がおかしいとは思っていたんです。もしあの人がろくでなしどもとつるんでいたと知っていれば、私が自分の手で彼らを見つけて、絞め殺していましたとも！」
languages.original_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: 「兄のことです。最近様子がおかしいとは思っていたんです。もしあの人がろくでなしどもとつるんでいたと知っていれば、私が自分の手で彼らを見つけて、絞め殺していましたとも！」

languages.text: "Kardeşimin ruhu {mf|lordum|leydim}. Son zamanlarda kendinde değil gibi hissediyorum. Alçaklarla hoşbeş ettiğini bilsem onları teker teker bulur, ellerimle boğardım!"
languages.original_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşimin, {mf|lordum|leydim}. Son zamanlarda kendisi değil gibi hissediyorum. Alçaklarla hoşbeş ettiğini bilsem onları teker teker bulur ve ellerimle boğardım!"

languages.text: «Por la de mi hermano, mi {mf|Señor|Señora}. Tenía la sensación de que no actuaba como siempre. De haber sabido que se codeaba con rufianes, ¡los habría encontrado y estrangulado con mis propias manos!».
languages.original_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: «Por la de mi hermano, mi {mf|Señor|Señora}. Tenía la sensación de que no actuaba como siempre. De haber sabido que se codeaba con rufianes, ¡los habría encontrado y estrangulado con mis propias manos!».

languages.text: “我哥哥的灵魂，大人。我早就感觉我哥哥最近有点不太正常。如果我早知道他和那群混蛋混在一起，我会把那些人一个个揪出来，亲手掐断他们的脖子！”
languages.original_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: “我哥哥的灵魂，大人。我早就感觉我哥哥最近有点不太正常。如果我早知道他和那群混蛋混在一起，我会把那些人一个个揪出来，亲手掐断他们的脖子！”

languages.text: « Celle de mon frère, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Il n'était pas dans son état normal, dernièrement. Si j'avais su qu'il frayait avec des criminels, je serais allée les trouver et je les aurais étranglés de mes propres mains ! »
languages.original_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: « Celle de mon frère, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Il n'était pas dans son état normal, dernièrement. Si j'avais su qu'il frayait avec des criminels, je serais allée les trouver et je les aurais étranglés de mes propres mains ! »

languages.text: "Für die Seele meines Bruders, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich habe gespürt, dass er in letzter Zeit anders war. Hätte ich gewusst, dass er sich mit Schurken eingelassen hat, hätte ich sie aufgespürt und mit meinen bloßen Händen erwürgt."
languages.original_text: "My brother's, my {mf|lord|lady}. I had a feeling he wasn't acting himself lately. If I'd known he had fallen in with scoundrels, I would have found them and strangled them with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Für die Seele meines Bruders, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich habe gespürt, dass er in letzter Zeit anders war. Hätte ich gewusst, dass er sich mit Schurken eingelassen hat, hätte ich sie aufgespürt und mit meinen bloßen Händen erwürgt."
